name: 3BHK Independent Villa Cochin - Holiday Home 10 minutes from Lulu Mall Kochi - House in Ernakulam
address: KVMR 63C Manjummel, Udyogamandal PO, 683501 Cochin, India, KVMR 63C Manjummel, Udyogamandal PO, Kerala, 683501, India
description:
Elegant Accommodation: 3BHK Independent Villa Cochin in Cochin offers a spacious villa with three bedrooms and three bathrooms. The property features a private entrance, ensuring privacy and comfort for all guests.

Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy a garden, terrace, and free WiFi. The villa is equipped with air-conditioning, a fully fitted kitchen, washing machine, and streaming services. Additional amenities include a dining area, balcony, and free toiletries.

Convenient Location: Located 18 km from Cochin International Airport, the villa is close to attractions such as Cochin Shipyard (15 km) and Kerala Museum (4.4 km). Free on-site private parking is available for guests.
